pullrequest.title: Fix for adding links after a model has been constructed

content.raw:
Nitpick: Can we call this function something like `UpdateSkeletonInWorld()` instead? I got very confused about the difference between this function and `AddModel(~)`.

I was also confused about how you could add a skeleton without to a world without specifying which world, but if you’re just updating a Skeleton that’s already in a world, then it makes sense that you don’t need to specify the world.
content.html:
Nitpick: Can we call this function something like UpdateSkeletonInWorld() instead? I got very confused about the difference between this function and AddModel(~).

I was also confused about how you could add a skeleton without to a world without specifying which world, but if you’re just updating a Skeleton that’s already in a world, then it makes sense that you don’t need to specify the world.
